code: Federal Decree-Law No. (32) of 2021 - Commercial Companies Law
scope: Governs commercial companies and business entities in the UAE

civil_company.definition: Partnership between two or more natural or legal persons

simple_commandite_company.definition: Partnership with both general and limited partners
simple_commandite_company.minimum_partners: At least one general and one limited partner

public_joint_stock_company.definition: Company whose capital is divided into shares offered to public

private_joint_stock_company.definition: Company whose shares are not offered to public

limited_liability_company.definition: Company with liability limited to capital contribution

single_person_company.definition: Company owned by a single shareholder

incorporation_requirements.name_reservation: Check availability through Department of Economic Development (DED)
incorporation_requirements.capital_deposit: Minimum capital must be deposited in bank
incorporation_requirements.registration: Register with DED and obtain incorporation certificate

general_assembly.ordinary_meeting: Annual meeting within 4 months of fiscal year end
general_assembly.quorum: Majority of shareholders with majority of capital
general_assembly.decisions: Simple majority for ordinary, 75% for extraordinary

auditing.requirement: Mandatory for all companies except single person
auditing.reports: Annual audit report submitted to DED

dissolution.compulsory: By court order for illegal activities
